All Open Graph meta tags reference "The X" instead of "Beyblade X Teams"
The browser tab title shows "The X"

acceptanceCriteria: The HomePage hero section and feature cards reference "The X" where appropriate

No instances of "Beyblade X Teams" remain in user-visible text
